name: Pomela Cat Royale
description:
CORE GAMEPLAY IS LOCAL PVP - YOU NEED TO PLAY WITH 2-4 PLAYERS.

Game made for UE4 Summer Jam 2018.  ( #ue4jam ) Theme: Well that escalated quickly.

Please check controls in main menu.

Pomela cat royale, lets you jump beetwen micro and macro expanse of universe. Play with friends and discover wonders of life and space, as you battle each other to become the very best of Cosmos. A game with edge, wit, agility and skills. Master it and overcome your buddies in this joyful crazy ride. Remember about sunblocker tho, your friends might get burned! Also this game has cat.
